__e: His attack was a distraction to keep us away from Garrus.
If he knows we're coming, he might run.
Why would he run away from San Diego... from the one thing that was working in his life?
He's a thief, a fugitive from the law.
It flees from men as if it knew to fear them... but it spares neither woman nor child.
As if it were eluding me.
